subject: PRO X Pedal Control Box upgrade firmware for VAM PRO Haptics
description_text:
Hello,

I have a set of PRO X pedals I purchased earlier this year.  I have
upgraded them with your new VAM Pro haptic reactors.

From what I have read, all I have to do is update the firmware on the ProX
control box.  I don't see anything within the Simsonn Manager software to
perform this firmware update.  Nor do I see anything on your website with
instructions on this.

I cannot get the haptic reactors to function, none of the three
currently function.  So, I assume my control box is still not updated
properly.

Do you have an instruction guide on how to perform this update?  Or do I
have to purchase a new control box?

Thank you!

Jeff Miller
jm112583@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeff Miller,     Please uninstall the old version of the software from your PC and install the attached version 2.1.1. In the software, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update, then select the file pedals-firmware-pedals-prox.sfu. Once the update is complete, the VAM Pro will work properly.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BAdSWa1bxmbPksj9Hlzuo8bl7_bM8ixr/view?usp=drive_link
